name: Space Miner (FallOrpheus)
description:
Mine asteroids for minerals in space. Currently only one level available.

Controls:

  • Hover over labels with the mouse. If they are clickable, they will turn red. Left click to activate them.
  • Scroll wheel to zoom in and out.
  • Right click and drag to move the map.

Developed on GitHub with MonoGame and released under the Mozilla Public License Version 2.0. The assets used in this game are released under a variety of different licenses, which you can find here.
